title: Battered women: violence behind closed doors
creator_credit: J Gary Mitchell Film Company, J. Gary Mitchell and Christina Crowley
brief_description: Examines the problem of wife beating and points out new methods of police intervention in cases of domestic violence. Includes interviews with abusive men and victimised women, encouraging women to speak out and seek protection from violent husbands.
